Package dalserver

Implements the server side of the VO data access layer (DAL) interfaces.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    The Config class manages the DALServer Web-app local configuration, including global framework configuration, and configuration of all locally defined services.
    ConfigField
    The ConfigField class represents a configurable table field and its attributes.
    ConfigTable
    The ConfigTable class implements a dynamic table configuration mechanism used to customize the contents of the table output produced by service queries.
    DalContext
    DALServer context class.
    DalTask
    The DalTask class provides the capability to execute an external task or program, to be executed as a separate process.
    DateParser
    Date parser for ISO 8601 format.
    DbColumn
    The DbColumn (table column) class is used to store metadata describing a column of a database table.
    DbColumns
    The DbColumns class implements a parameter set mechanism oriented toward service request parameters.
    DbmsDataSourceFactory
    JDBC DataSource management.
    DbmsQuery
    DbmsQuery provides a thin layer for the Java DriverManager (JDBC) class to deal with the peculiarities of different supported database managers as used within the DALServer framework.
    HashCodeUtil
    Collected methods which allow easy implementation of hashCode.
    KeywordFactory
    KeywordFactory implements a factory class for well-known DAL keywords, including Groups, Params and Fields.
    KeywordTable
    KeywordTable implements a simple keyword-value keyword table.
    Param
    The Param (parameter) class is used to store a runtime parameter instance, e.g., a GET/POST request parameter input to a DAL service.
    ParamSet
    The ParamSet class implements a parameter set mechanism oriented toward service request parameters.
    Range
    The Range class implements a single Range element, and is used to contruct range lists.
    RangeList
    The RangeList class implements a multi-element, numeric or string, ordered or unordered range list object.
    RequestParams
    The RequestParams class renders an HTTP GET/POST servlet request into a regularized parameter set.
    RequestResponse
    The RequestResponse class is used to build a servlet request response object, which is then serialized and returned to the client to respond to a service request.
    TableField
    The TableField class is used to represent a field of a table (or a field of a data model stored in a table).
    TableGroup
    The TableGroup class is used to represent the Group construct of a table, that is, a construct which associates several Param, Field, or Group elements of a table as part of a higher level logical group or association.
    TableInfo
    The TableInfo class is used to add an INFO element to a RequestResponse object (in the VOTable serialization the INFO will be written to the RESOURCE element, not to the table itself).
    TableParam
    The TableParam class is used to represent a global parameter in a table, that is, a parameter which applies to the entire table.
    Task
    The Task class is used to create, prepare, execute, and collect the output from a task instance, executing the task via the tasking subsystem.
    TaskConnection
    The TaskConnection class provides a connection to a remote tasking daemon.
    TaskManager
    The TaskManager class provides a distributed asynchronous tasking capability.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ParamLevel
    The level to which a parameter belongs, e.g., the scope or type of standard.
    ParamType
    All defined parameter types.
    RangeType
    All possible range element types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DalOverflowException
    Thrown when overflow of the result table occurs.
    DalServerException
    Indicates a generic error occuring during exection of the DAL service.
    InvalidDateException
    Thrown when an invalid formatted Date string has been encountered.

Package dalserver Description

Implements the server side of the VO data access layer (DAL) interfaces.

This package contains Java code for implementing IVOA Data Access Layer (DAL) services. The dalserver package provides two main top level externally-callable classes for use in writing DAL services: RequestParams, and RequestResponse. RequestParams is used to read an HTTP GET or POST request and render the request as a fully processed service parameter set (e.g., for a specific service such as SSAP). RequestResponse and the related dalserver classes are used to build the response to the request. The response is built up as a data model in memory and subsequently serialized, for example as a VOTable, to respond to the request.

The "business logic" for the service (the part which differs locally) is responsible for reading the local DBMS or data collection, and computing the metadata which will be returned in response to the request. For example, in the case of SSAP, the service should subclass the SsapService class to provide these functions for the local environment. This class is then used in the SsapServlet class to build a servlet implementing the service.

Package Specification

  • Simple Spectral Access protocol
  • Simple Image Access protocol

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
